title: Lessons from Scaling Our Platform
excerpt: What worked, what didn’t, and what we’d do differently after scaling to millions of requests.
author: Platform Team
content:
# Scaling Lessons

## Phase 1: Observability
We invested in metrics, tracing, and structured logs.

## Phase 2: Bottlenecks
We identified hotspots in our database and cache strategy.

## Phase 3: Reliability
We introduced SLOs and incident response runbooks.
